short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show and compare dota2 heros. Add favorites of douyu dota2 streams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fetch all online Douyu dota2 streams when you open a new tab. If user is interested in one stream, user can either click a link and go view the original Douyu stream, or add their interested stream to favorites, so they can check that later with ease. Besides that, user can also view dota2 heros attributes in this extension.
